title: Rachel Reeves – 2022 Comments on ONS Growth Figures
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Rachel Reeves, the Shadow Chancellor of the Exchequer, on Twitter on 12 December 2022.
content:
GDP figures show UK economy shrank by 0.3% in the three months to October – underlining Tory failure to grow our economy.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

We do not have to continue on this path.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

Labour will get our economy growing, with our Green Prosperity Plan and an active partnership with business.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
